lender.name: Ricky
lender.loan_because: I can. I'm lucky. I support and respect entrepreneurs of any type and this is a simple, low-risk way for me to help someone make a real difference in their life with the money I loan.
lender.occupational_info:
Creative. In all kinds of ways.
In particular I'm just launching a goal setting site that helps people achieve their dreams: www.wishbomb.com

lender.name: Punahou
lender.loan_because: i like ta loan
lender.occupational_info: i like ta work

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: because I can help
lender.occupational_info: My job is within the Fire Service and it is to reduce the amount of arson/deliberate fires within the area.

lender.name: Tonje Anita
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the same opportunities

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I am now in a position where I can - and I have known what its like to need a helping hand !
lender.occupational_info: I work in a chemical processing plant. My job is to arrange transport between sites for the materials. I also have to work out the mass balances so that we know what has been processed and how much material it has taken to produce that amount. I enjoy it !

lender.name: Sahana
lender.loan_because: The idea of lending a hand to people who are taking the initiative to help themselves inspires me... I believe that those who can afford to share and give, should!
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in the expansion and development of my bank's retail banking network in emerging countries

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: Seems a good way to help people directly. And in some small way make a difference.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to live a good and meaningful life regardless of their ethnicity,gender,religion, or nationality. I feel people should try to take on a small role in helping their fellow man when they are in need.

lender.name: Rindie & Jan
lender.loan_because: Pay it Forward!
lender.occupational_info:
Facialist specialising in Anti-Aging including Micro-Current, as well as peelings and other skin related treatments. Oxygen forms a large part in my facials and compliment the Nano Technological products
My other half is in Financials, looking at figures all day and analysing trends - love it

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: of a man called Muhammed Yunnus who proved people can be helped without being patronised! "Learning how to fish is the real deal!"

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur who is also a single mother, I know how important it is to fund women with vision and integrity so they can claim their place in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write books and give speeches that inspire people to improve their lives and overcome bad times.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I think investing in the entrepreneurial spirit is an effective way to pull people out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I help people use library resources like books, movies, and online databases.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help and it makes me feel good. I wish Srean Pho and his family the best.
lender.occupational_info: I am a delivery driver in San Francisco, Ca. I live alone in a studio apt. with my cat, Bunny.

lender.name: Jason
lender.occupational_info: I help developing nations do so in a manner that utilizes the local environmant for local economic benefit in an environmantally sustainable way.

lender.name: Jean Mary
lender.occupation: English as a Second Language Teacher
lender.occupational_info: I teach international students to speak and write English.

lender.name: Colby
lender.loan_because: It is my duty as a Christian, and as an American Citizen
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at The George Washington University

lender.name: Dianna
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to live in a place where I can take the basics for granted. I need to give back.

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to get ahead in life.

lender.name: Liv Inger
lender.loan_because: A sustainable solution!

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: Where at the moment my husband was in experienced stroke for approximately six months and I had the child who was named Christian as well as the baby that were found by me when I have carried out the work as the street beggar and the collector of second-hand things since my husband was slandered so as to be able to not work again, moreover also I had relatives a faith Mr. Rachmad that went with my family and helped the economy of my family by working as the building worker that results very few like me.
lender.occupational_info: I carried out the work of gathering second-hand things that were sold by me came back to get an amount of food money and the everyday requirement for my family.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: i'd like other people to have the chance to achieve their goals, and as a way of thankng all the people who have given me help and chances in the past.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an airline, making sure that we get the best possible result from Government policies and decisions.

lender.name: Grandma Bead
lender.loan_because:
After spending years grumbling whilst reading newspapers and watching the News at how difficult it is for ordinary people from across the world to get themselves out of poverty I decided to stop grumbling and do something about it.
Power to the People :)

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I live in the western world, which means even those of us who are not 'rich' by western standards have an enormous amount compared to anyone we have the opportunity of sharing with on this site. Our loans here contribute to something that can snowball significantly for the individuals & communities concerned. This is a beautifully simple idea - hats off to Kiva, enabling people to give 'a hand up and not a hand out'.
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals and companies to develop their businesses and/or promote their message more effectively on the web, also to advise on using internet systems and technologies to their best advantage.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: The best way to preview a better future... is to make it!
lender.occupational_info: Promotion & Communication of Italian wine worldwide.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: it something I can do to help someone help themselves to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people heal.

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to role-model social responsibility to my two daughters. We in the western world have SO much abundance, sharing with others is far more joyful than gathering more for ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am based in Ireland working for a large American multi-national company. I love working with colleagues across Europe and globally with different life experiences and cultures. We are rewarded for our hard work and have opportunities to drive real change which is very motivating.

lender.name: Hilde
lender.loan_because: I hope that a contribution from me may have an impact on improving someone's lives

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: I have some spare money that I hope can make a difference to someone who wants to achieve.
lender.occupational_info: I study mathematics and neuroscience at a university, i.e. I am interesteded in how the brain works.

lender.name: Ingrid

Leihen ist Hilfe zur Selbsthilfe.

lender.occupational_info:
Ich programmiere fürs Internet und Desktop-Applikationen
I program websites, desktop applications

lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Esther
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make this world a better place ;-)

lender.name: Borger
lender.loan_because: I want to help and this is so much better than charity.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people achieve something great

lender.occupational_info: pretty demanding, but also very much fun, you need to have an eye for details and also speak a lot of languages :)

lender.occupational_info: Wonderful. Pelle T. Pelle T Nilsson. The best.

lender.loan_because: I find this the most appealing way of helping people, rather than just giving money to charity, as this is something that enhances the spirit of enterprise and entrepreneurship.

lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by God with the ability to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired.

lender.name: Melissa

lender.occupational_info: I work in the financial industry.

lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher.

lender.name: sally
lender.loan_because: i want to help someone achieve their goals, we all need a little support at some time in our lifes.
lender.occupational_info: i work in retail in a large dept. store

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I'm a civil engineer, working predominantly on mining projects in 3rd world countries

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world." Mahatma Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: Many face extreme challenges funding their great ideas and passions with their limited resources. We encourage and enable these risk-takers to inspire others through their efforts to improve their own lives and the future of their local communities.

lender.name: Bernhard
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in a direct wayto get better living possibilities.
lender.occupational_info: I am still involved as a consultant on preservation and restauration of cultural heritage world wide

lender.name: Amarilla
lender.loan_because: The stories and the ability to make a small difference in a big world.

lender.name: Lyn and Mark
lender.loan_because: We want to contribute and make a difference in the world with people who think likewise. We have been blessed in our lives and want to help others achieve their potential.
lender.occupational_info: Training and helping people to achieve their potential

lender.name: Bjarne
lender.loan_because: What a good way to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I help find the energy we all need on this planet (that is, before we can tap into pollution free solar/wind/wave energy.

lender.name: People of the World Fund
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help people from all over the world. I also think it is important to get more directly involved to raise knowledge, awareness and perspective
lender.occupational_info: This fund works directly like Kiva, but is not limited in categories or countries to help in. www.facebook.com/pages/The-People-of-the-World-Fund/111607548853389?v=info

lender.name: LORAINE
lender.loan_because: I,ve had help from other people in my working life and I'd like to be able to do the same for someone else

lender.name: Danika & Jamel
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others. Seeing the face of people we loan to, and getting a little snapshot into their lives gives such a sense of human connection.

lender.name: Harvey
lender.loan_because: Boredom

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: I have selfish motivations, it makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures of people playing sports

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: I think it is amazing that I can help somebody else in the world help both themselves and others in their community.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate with people in our company to help bring their IT project ideas to reality.

lender.name: Yiqi
lender.loan_because: This is one of the best investments I am aware of.
lender.occupational_info: Try to hit a home-run in investment world :)

lender.name: Beat
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help individuals and families to make an impact in their local community and in their country. It is great to see money put to productive use and I look forward to seeing many successful ventures.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I am at school, so I am giving my birthday money.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I want other's to have the opportunity to fulfill all of their dreams!

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: Katherine Bateman asked me to! And, becuase I want to support others who want to create a better life for themselves & those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I build big buildings.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an easy and effective way to help people help themselves. As a bonus you get to feel better about yourself.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can and I should. Success is as much about opportunity as capacity. I like to help provide the opportunity.

lender.name: annmarie, marilyn & MA
lender.loan_because: We do this as a gift for each other.There are 3 of us, myself Marilyn and MaryAnn

lender.name: Jurrien
lender.loan_because: I believe it's important to support entrepreneurial activities and that anyone who has the drive to become their own boss should be given an opportunity to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I provide business development consulting services to a major global bank. I also co-own a farm with my cousin. We grow corn, asparagus, tomatos, squash, melons, onions and potatos, produce maple syrup and raise raise free range beef cows, chickens and turkeys.

lender.name: SondreogStine
lender.loan_because: This is really a fantastic idea. We got inspired by a program on tv.
lender.occupational_info: My wife work as a pre school teacher in a kindergarten in Norway, I work with IT systems.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: It just might make a difference in someone's life and it is essentially free. What could be wrong with that!
lender.occupational_info: I created, sell, and give away a software program that helps people resolve conflicts in such a way that both parties get as much as possible. It figures out the best win-win solutions. It is used by colleges around the world in classes in alternative dispute resolution.

lender.name: Mary-Katherine
lender.loan_because: It's exciting to be involved with such innovative people!

lender.name: Jan Rune
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Wilson Chang
lender.loan_because: Credit can be an extremely effective tool for stimulating economic development and helping the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an investor.

lender.name: Star
lender.loan_because: I am a student and an inventor and I appreciate how hard it can be to get projects started! If you have the motivation, I hope to help provide the means!

lender.name: Tony & Judy
lender.loan_because: We have been helped ourselves and now have a successful business, so we want to help others
lender.occupational_info: operate a caravan (holiday) park

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: I find Kiva to be the most innovative and fun way to reach out and help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I help fix peoples hearts.

lender.name: Vlandis Family

lender.occupational_info: I make software products for the apparel decoration industry.

lender.name: Nolan
lender.loan_because: Others have lent to me. It's important to help others when you can, and this is a great way to lend a hand.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: of the sacrificial love of Jesus Christ

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I know the debilitation of being under-capitalised. With $25 and a few other lenders we can give someone a start. That is all it takes.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want others to have a fair opportunity to make the most of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a retail bank branch that provides loans for personal and business purposes.

lender.name: Brian And Lena
lender.loan_because: sometimes all people need is a little help.

lender.name: bette
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a loving family and sufficient resources. Therefore I lend to help others achieve their goals.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: it is a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help graduates of a college stay connected to that college.

lender.occupational_info: I make computer programs.

lender.name: Rachel

lender.occupational_info: I assist people in times when they are sick or injured. I then take them to Hospital. I also train others to do the same. I love my job. I am truly blessed.

lender.name: Nigel & Michelle
lender.loan_because: it's something positive we can do TODAY.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I think this is an incredible way in which wealth can be created by channelling resources.....but I'm somewhat concerned about the direction Kiva is taking and may review my participation.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now. I spend a good deal of my time on my webpage supporting men with prostate cancer - and their families.

lender.name: Anette
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe that small entrepreneurs have a good chance of making life in their country better for many people.

lender.name: Fran

lender.name: Briana
lender.loan_because: I wish to help people around the world.

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.loan_because: I have a blessed life and want to help other people to live their best life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a College Lecturer and help young people to be the best they can be.

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I believe that together we can make a real difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work making doctors aware of what medications there are available to treat different diseases, and what may be the best treatment option for different patients.

lender.name: The Hotton Family
lender.loan_because: we can.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful idea to connect with people in developing countries, and to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Maxime Brusse
lender.loan_because: I like to help people with ambition!
lender.occupational_info: I make websites and videos

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: I am deeply aware of how blessed I have been in the circumstances of my life, and I wish to extend some of those blessings to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am learning how to care medically for people of all ages. I hope to be able to use these skills to work in other parts of the world in the near future.

lender.name: Abay Ethiopian Cuisine
lender.loan_because: In lieu of giving party favors to the guests at our wedding, we decided to loan modest amounts to entrepreneurs in 10 African countries on the guests' behalf. All of our attendees were provided information for the entrepreneur in which they invested. We've continued to loan to African entrepreneurs by waiving corkage fees we collect from customers and applying those funds towards our Kiva account.
lender.occupational_info: Heather is an Environmental Engineer. Jamie is an attorney who owns an Ethiopian restaurant. As an entrepreneur, Jamie knows how beneficial it is to have the funds to start or expand a business.

lender.name: Ceris
lender.loan_because: Because everyone deserves a chance. I believe in life being a challenge but i don't think it should be so tough for some!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a social work student. I hope to be able to help people (both children and adults) to imporve their life when they face difficulties.

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I am nearing the end of my studies to be an Industrial - Organizational (I/O) Psychologist. What I/O psycholgists do is help people perform their work better. That could mean helping them get along with others better, finding ways to make the work easier to do, or doing things that help put the right people into the right jobs.

lender.name: melody
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Healers.LA
lender.loan_because: I believe in the possibility of transformation

lender.name: janet
lender.loan_because: helping people help themselves creates a better world. We are meant to help each other, to give and to receive with good intent.
lender.occupational_info: I find talented creative people for big companies who want to hire them.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: For many reasons. I enjoy supporting people around the world who are pursuing a fulfilling life. I know my money is better used by these kiva borrowers than on snack food and entertainment for me. I feel an innovative company like Kiva needs to be supported.
lender.occupational_info: I research coastal ecology in the Great Bay, NH.

lender.name: Thomas Turner
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help change peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: Studying and playing sport!

lender.loan_because: I want to save the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, in a large company, trying to make our business more efficient.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected. Luke 12:48

lender.name: Darnell
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people out who strive for the same mission to be successful business owners.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Support manager who supports all of the technology on campus also over Helpdesk,Desktop, Audiovisual technician.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I am studying and i have my trainneship to Croatia, but I need money for the tickets.
lender.occupational_info: I am system engineer student, i work in a college as an office asistant, and that is the way I support my family, mother and father

lender.occupational_info: I consult people with my knowledge in plastic manufacturing and processing

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I believe everybody diserves a fair chance.

lender.name: Gilbert
lender.loan_because: My wife and I are in a position to help others who are less fortunate. And we feel an obligation to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Administered a private high school; was an English teacher.

lender.name: Abigail
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I feel I can help people to grow in all areas of themself with just a little help from others. All it takes is someone who cares and that can change how someone else feels. I hope I can lend more in the future as my business grows.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a single mum since 1993 and have two beautiful sons who are now 21 and 23. I also have a dog called Indigo Blu. I too have a home based business and understand the difficulty of starting and continuing a business when you are not financially affluent. I help people with balancing mind, body & spirit. I teach Meditation & Spiritual Development and I am a SCIO Biofeedback Stress Reduction Practitioner.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I believe economic opportunity is a basic right and I am grateful for the chance to help nurture the entrepreneurial spirit of the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with process improvement and business planning.

lender.name: Royaltau
lender.occupational_info: Tau is the Tswana word for Lion. May the lion within awaken for you too!

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I have had great personal fortune in this life and wish to share my prosperity with those less fortunate than I.

lender.name: Jane

lender.name: Jennifer and Olivia
lender.loan_because: We want to lend a hand to people and help build their businesses and empower them so hopefully one day they can feel the satisifaction of helping out others in need.

lender.name: Molly, Sam & Keith
lender.occupation: Attorney/Mom, Son and Father of Son
lender.loan_because: My family cares. Kiva is an easy way to help others succeed.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: it is amazing the impact of what $25 can do for someone who really needs it.

lender.name: Wonderful World Journeys

lender.occupational_info: I am a travel agent specializing in travel to Southeast Asia. I strive to get my clients out off the main tourist areas and into the authentic culture of the country they are visiting.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I love Kiva :)
lender.occupational_info: messing about with computers

lender.name: Anny

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I am thankful to be able to do so

lender.loan_because: It's a great way to share with less fortunate people, and be able to assist in a productive way.

lender.occupation: Lucille is an Office Administrator; Bob is retired

lender.loan_because: I want to help people who really need it. Even a small amount of money can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Localisation, translation (video game industry)

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I believe that of those who have been privileged, much is expected. Throughout life, someone has helped you attain your goals and achieve the inconceivable at each milestone. lender.name: Rui
lender.loan_because:
Being an entrepreneur myself, i trully believe that investing in human talent is always a good investment. Everyone deserves a better life.
Also, to perpetuate the memories of Luís António, Belmira Joaquina and Liduina Avelar da Silva. May peace be with them wherever they are.
"You must be the change you wish to see in the world" Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I basically manage computer applications and websites projects.

lender.name: Claire
lender.occupational_info: I work in a cafe, washing dishes and taking people's food and drinks to their tables. I also study computing at university.

lender.name: Nighean
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a single reason not to.

lender.name: panika
lender.loan_because:
As a fan of Oprah show - I have learnt you need to give back to those not as fortunate, that's where I heard of Kiva.
I like that I can give this money and actually know who is benefitting and always prefer giving money towards under-delevoped countries.

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: I can. I'm inspired by people who materially have much less than me but are still striving to carve out a decent existence for themselves, their families and their communities. And I want to support them in that.

lender.name: Kids and Dogs
lender.loan_because: During my life when I needed money, people were there to help me out. Now, when I have the means to help others, I feel this is a way to "pay it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I teach children and adults to play the piano and other musical instruments. I believe that through music we grow as individuals. Through music we reach across cultural lines to learn to live together in peace.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Sota
lender.loan_because: I would like to support someone who helps ownself.
lender.occupational_info: designing electronic device

lender.name: Norwegian
lender.loan_because: In this way money I 'donate' can be used over and over again for several people. When the first lender pays back I will lend that money to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work with water management, working to maintain good water quality or improve water quality where needed.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish, and he will eat for a day. Teach a man to fish and he will eat for a lifetime."

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: kiva allows us to leverage our small donations to make large impacts on real people half way around the world. How cool is that!?
lender.occupational_info: I am a Computer Information Systems Instructor at Ouachita Tech.

lender.name: Bea & Gene
lender.loan_because: We have chosen to use part of our federal Economic Stimulus payment to help needy persons in other countries on an ongoing basis.

lender.name: Laci & Manuel
lender.loan_because: To help individuals attain their goals so that they can then go on to help others themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals research information for their personal and/or professional lives. My husband promotes small Texas farmers and growers to assist them in marketing their products.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I want to be a loaner
lender.occupational_info: Education - one of the most beautiful job

lender.name: Mattias W
lender.loan_because: it's great to be able to help people this way!
lender.occupational_info: I am writing software for phones.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I've been very blessed and want to help others.

lender.name: Torben
lender.loan_because: I think that the money can be a help for someone
lender.occupational_info: church organisation

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I think it is great how Kiva brings people together from all over to help others. The fact that as a group we can help people with goals continue to move forward makes me smile.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people in child care centers and family child care homes.

lender.name: Ruben
lender.loan_because: we are one at our core, and we believe that this is one of that best ways to help everyone involved. This is a win/win for everyone:-)
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are both Flight Attendant for Southwest Airlines. We have two wonderful children ages 10 and 12. We have been truly blessed and we would just like to pass some of our blessing on to others. :-)

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: What I do for another, I do for myself, all of us are connected.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I consider it an investment. The return on investment is the prosperity that the borrowers achieve through their own efforts. This, I hope, promotes social stability (dare I say "peace") on our planet.
lender.occupational_info: I lend my efforts to projects that enhance a healthy environment.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to lead just and meaningful lives. Big banks say it's too risky to loan money to poor people. I know they are wrong. Microcredit works.
lender.occupational_info: My work provides an amazing opportunity to wake up every morning excited, passionate and fulfilled.

lender.name: rebekah
lender.loan_because: I want people to have a chance to succeede.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I wish to help an individual overcome challenging barriers in order to better either their personal life or the lives of those around them .
lender.occupational_info: I work with people and their families who have rare inherited conditions that make them susceptible to develop kidney cancer.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I love seeing entrepreneurs getting access to capital and successfully establishing their businesses thus creating jobs and increasing the standard of living for their family, community and country. This awesome program allows almost anyone to become a philanthropist.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I want to help women in agriculture in other parts of the world. I hope that by helping another woman, I will improve life for her family and especially for her daughters. I am personally interested in small-scale agriculture, and I would like to make it possible for more women to make a living from it.
lender.occupational_info: Managing my household's resources carefully is very important to me. I have a large garden, keep chickens for eggs, and bake my own bread so that my husband and I can live off of his salary and repay the mortgage on our home quickly. I love to cook, and I teach cooking classes to adult students.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I hope to positively affect the economic inequalities in the world!

lender.name: Sayward
lender.loan_because: I sincerely want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I paint and make sculptures and use recycled materials whenever I can.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to live and work in a developed country.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: A little can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a bank, I go to college and I am a mother.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in disadvantaged countries improve their lives and the prospects for their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am an unpaid volunteer worker in my local community.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because:
As a home-based business operator myself, I know the challenges of being an entrepreneur.
I am also one of four women who founded The Grapevine, a non-profit group that monthly surprises a new retail business in Victoria, BC Canada by taking 25 potential new customers to their store and announcing them "best of the bunch for the month" (www.wegrape.ca)
lender.occupational_info: I help clients eliminate clutter and organize what's left.

lender.name: Dorian
lender.loan_because: I´m actually trying to raise some found in order to finish my thesis in ecuador. Moving from the rainforest to the city has been difficult for me. My goal, to get a high education, then go back my community and help natives as i m part of them too. hope to find some lenders who can help me to acomplish my main goal....
lender.occupational_info: at the moment working with some natives communities

lender.name: Shahla
lender.loan_because: In memory of my dear friend, Shahla.
lender.occupational_info: She was a children's librarian and a story teller.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to empower other people (especially women!) around the world to grow their own businesses and support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am passionate about starting businesses of all kinds and helping other people do the same.

lender.name: Tekla
lender.loan_because: I am a mom of three children and I choose to stay at home. I am a Stylist with Stella & Dot. In appreciation for my opportunity, I wish to support other women who are operating retail businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I sell jewellery.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky enough to have been given the opportunities to be able to go to school and choose a career where I will make money. I'd like to give the same opportunity to others- the ability to earn a living without having to worry about where the initial capital will come from.
lender.occupational_info: I am a dentist. I work in a hospital and I help patients with toothaches, missing teeth, and those who want to maintain their smiles. I hope to one day work in pediatrics, treating children. Once a year, I take a trip somewhere in the world to treat patients who could not otherwise afford or have access to a dentist.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: those who are blessed have a responsibility to give what they can.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together and I can and I want to and I should.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to improve their health through proper nutrition and supplementation.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.occupation: Business Owner, Childcare Director and Actor
lender.loan_because: I believe in the quality and content of this program
lender.occupational_info: I am a childcare advocate, I own my own telecommunications business and I have fun with the gift that God gave me, which is the ability to sing and act.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: From little things, big things grow.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want to leave a legacy How will they remember me? Did I choose to love? Did I point to You enough To make a mark on things? I want to leave an offering A child of mercy and grace who blessed your name unapologetically And leave that kind of legacy
lender.occupational_info: I am a therapist. I work with young children with Autism in hopes to make a difference-one child at a time.

lender.name: shaad
lender.loan_because: its good karma

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Loans were made to me.

lender.name: Rocio & Ben
lender.loan_because: the project is a great opportunity for the entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to cut out the beauracracy and get the money where it can do the most good as quickly as possible.
lender.occupational_info: I make cities and towns more livable places with an emphasis on planning for walkability, inclusion, arts and culture and economic justice for all.

lender.name: Penelope
lender.loan_because: I believe in the positive impact of lending funds to entrepreneurs and because I cannot afford to donate.
lender.occupational_info: I help business communicate with other business that don't speak their language.

lender.name: Cecellia & Mark
lender.loan_because: We want pay it forward and in a small way help and hope to one day eliminate poverty and hunger.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional trainer in image management.

lender.name: ideasmultiples
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: In ideasmultiples.com serve the community, which is why we support hosting service offering completely free to charities dedicated to providing aid to needy, to training, improving the quality of life and promoting culture. ----------------------- En ideasmultiples.com servimos a la comuniddad, por eso apoyamos ofreciendo el servicio de hosting totalmente gratuito a fundaciones sin ánimo de lucro dedicadas a ofrecer ayuda a necesitados, a la formación, a la mejora de la calidad de vida y a promover la cultura.
